languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, у нас внештатная ситуация! Мы получили сообщение, что на нижних палубах была замечена..." {n}Голос Мастера вокса срывается.{/n} "...была замечена леди фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, у нас внештатная ситуация! Мы получили сообщение, что на нижних палубах была замечена... была замечена леди фон Валанциус, предыдущий Вольный Торговец".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Vox Master's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, у нас внештатная ситуация! Мы получили сообщение, что на нижних палубах была замечена..." {n}Голос Мастера вокса срывается.{/n} "...была замечена леди фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Master of the Vox's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora! Your late predecessor!"

"Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Master of the Vox's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora! Your late predecessor!"

"Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Vox Master's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora! Your late predecessor!"

"Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Vox Master's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora! Your late predecessor!"
"Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Vox Master's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora!"

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们遇到了紧急情况！我们收到消息说，下层甲板有人看到了……”{n}音阵大师的声音顿了顿。{/n}“……有人看到了西奥多拉夫人！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Vox Master's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们遇到了紧急情况！我们收到消息说，下层甲板有人看到了……”{n}音阵大师的声音顿了顿。{/n}“……有人看到了西奥多拉夫人！”

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, es una emergencia! Hemos recibido noticias de las cubiertas inferiores. Se ha producido un avistamiento...». {n}La voz de la maestra de vocos le falla.{/n} «... ¡han avistado a lady Theodora!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Vox Master's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, es una emergencia! Hemos recibido noticias de las cubiertas inferiores. Se ha producido un avistamiento...». {n}La voz de la maestra de vocos le falla.{/n} «... ¡han avistado a lady Theodora!».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, es gibt einen Notfall! Wir haben die Nachricht erhalten, dass auf den unteren Decks eine Sichtung erfolgt ist ..." {n}Die Stimme der Voxmeisterin bricht.{/n} "… eine Sichtung von Lady Theodora!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Vox Master's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Vox Master's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora!"

languages.text: « Une urgence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nous avons été informés d'une apparition dans les ponts inférieurs... {n}hésite la maîtresse-vox dont la voix se brise,{/n} une apparition de dame Théodora ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Vox Master's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora!"

traits.locale_text: « Une urgence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nous avons été informés d'une apparition dans les ponts inférieurs... {n}hésite la maîtresse-vox dont la voix se brise,{/n} une apparition de dame Théodora ! »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、緊急事態が発生しました！下層デッキで目撃情報があったとの連絡が…」{n}ヴォクス・マスターの声が途切れる。{/n}「…シオドーラ様の目撃情報です！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Vox Master's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、緊急事態が発生しました！下層デッキで目撃情報があったとの連絡が…」{n}ヴォクス・マスターの声が途切れる。{/n}「…シオドーラ様の目撃情報です！」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, acil bir durum söz konusu! Alt güvertelerde şeyin görüldüğüne dair bir rapor aldık..." {n}Voks Üstadı, kelimeleri zar zor bir araya getirebiliyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora'nın görüldüğüne!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an emergency! We have received word that there has been a sighting on the lower decks..." {n}The Vox Master's voice breaks.{/n} "...a sighting of Lady Theodora!"
